amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-578 to prohibit funds for the charging of electric vehicles on Capitol property.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 262 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 262 (Roll no. 349).
